sign_in_subtitle: Injira kugira ngo ukomeze kuri Gigafaucet
password_min_length: Ijambobanga rigomba kuba byibuze {0} inyuguti ndende
password_must_contain_uppercase: Ijambobanga rigomba kuba ririmo nibura inyuguti imwe nkuru
password_must_contain_lowercase: Ijambobanga rigomba kuba rifite byibuze inyuguti nto
password_must_contain_number: Ijambobanga rigomba kuba byibuze nimero imwe
create_account_subtitle: Uzuza ibisobanuro biri hepfo kugira ngo ufungure konti yawe
forgot_password_subtitle: Injira aderesi imeri hanyuma tuzaguhereza umurongo wo gusubiramo ijambo ryibanga.
forgot_password_subtitle_sent: Twohereje ijambo ryibanga gusubiramo aderesi imeri yawe. Nyamuneka reba inbox hanyuma ukurikize amabwiriza.
join_thousands: Injira mubihumbi byabakoresha bamaze kubona Bitcoin kubuntu
hero_main_heading: Hindura igihe cyawe cyubusa muri Bitcoin yubusa
hero_subheading: Wunguka kugeza ku $596 USD kuri buri giciro
trusted_by_users: Yizewe nabakoresha hejuru ya {0} kwisi yose.
paying_since_2018: Kwishyura amafaranga ya crypto ku buntu kuva mu 2018.
how_it_works_heading: Tangira kubona crypto yubusa muminota mike!
choose_offer_desc: Fata ibyo watoranije kubikorwa biri kurupapuro rwinjiza. Dutondekanya ibyiza bitangwa namasosiyete ashaka kwamamaza porogaramu zabo, ubushakashatsi, nibicuruzwa.
complete_offer_desc: Ibyifuzo byinshi biroroshye cyane kandi bimaze kubona amafaranga kubantu ibihumbi. Benshi batanga kwishyura ibihembo byabo byambere muminota mike.
get_paid_instantly_desc: Bimaze kugenzurwa, ibyo winjije byongewe kuri konte yawe ako kanya. Kuramo ukoresheje Bitcoin, LiteCoin, Doge cyangwa Dash.
level_up_desc: Urwego rwo kuzamuka. Fungura ibihembo bya crypto. Kuva Hodler kugeza Cryptolord, uzabona kuzunguruka, kuzamura, nibindi byinshi.
avg_cashout_month: Avg. amafaranga kubakoresha bashya muri uku kwezi.
delete_account_confirmation_message: Uzi neza ko ushaka gusiba burundu konte yawe? Iki gikorwa ntigishobora gusubirwaho kandi amakuru yawe yose azavaho burundu.
delete_account_warning: [Iburira:] Ibi bizasiba burundu amakuru yawe yose harimo umwirondoro, amafaranga winjiza, n'amateka yubucuruzi.
failed_to_delete_account: Ntabwo byashobotse gusiba konti. Ongera ugerageze.
verification_code_sent: Kode yo kugenzura yoherejwe kuri imeri yawe
verify_delete_account_description: Twohereje kode 4 yo kugenzura kuri aderesi imeri yawe. Nyamuneka andika kode hepfo kugirango urangize gusiba konti.
verification_code_must_be_4_digits: Kode yo kugenzura igomba kuba imibare 4
offer_token_note: Ntugasangire iki kimenyetso numuntu. Inkunga ntizigera igusaba.
verification_failed: Kode yo kugenzura itemewe. Nyamuneka gerageza.
resend_failed: Kunanirwa kohereza kode yo kugenzura. Nyamuneka gerageza.
verification_required_message: Konti yawe igomba kugenzurwa mbere yuko winjira. Tuzohereza kode yo kugenzura kuri imeri yawe.
password_requirements: Ijambobanga rigomba kuba byibura inyuguti 8 z'uburebure
password_reset_successful: Gusubiramo ijambo ryibanga neza! Nyamuneka injira ijambo ryibanga rishya.
recaptcha_required: Nyamuneka reba neza ko utari robot
contact_us_description: Twifuza kukwumva. Twohereze ubutumwa natwe tuzasubiza vuba bishoboka.
name: Izina
subject: Ingingo
message_too_short: Ubutumwa bugomba kuba byibura inyuguti 10 z'uburebure
user_info_description: Iyi widget yerekana amakuru yemewe yumukoresha kuva kuri whoami API. Irahita ikemura ibintu byikorewe, gukemura amakosa, kandi irashobora kwinjizwa byoroshye muri ecran iyo ariyo yose.
compact_description: Padding ntoya hamwe nigishushanyo cyihariye kuruhande cyangwa gukoresha imashini.
custom_description: Customer gradient background ihuza insanganyamatsiko ya porogaramu.
import_widget: Kuzana UmukoreshaInfoWidget kurupapuro rwawe cyangwa ecran.
add_widget: Ongeraho widget kubiti bya widget hamwe nibikoresho wifuza.
customize_styling: Hindura imyandikire ukoresheje imitako hamwe na padi.
handle_states: Widget ihita ikemura imizigo, ikosa, hamwe nubusa.
level_rewards_subtitle: Urwego rwo hejuru nkuko winjiza & fungura ibihembo bishya.
level_rewards_points_description: Amanota 250 kugeza kurwego rukurikira. Winjiza amanota 1 kuri buri giceri 10 winjije.
level_progress_description: Amanota 250 kugera ku rwego rukurikira. Ubona inota 1 kuri buri biceri 10 byungutse.
profile_2fa_description: Twabonye ko udafite ibintu bibiri byemewe byemewe. Turagusaba gukora 2FA kugirango konte yawe igire umutekano.
profile_username_note: Izina ryukoresha rishobora guhinduka rimwe gusa muminsi 30.
profile_interest_description: Konti yawe izabona inyungu 5% mugihe ufite ibiceri birenga 35.000. Inyungu yishyurwa buri cyumweru.
security_enable_2fa_desc: Kode izoherezwa kuri imeri yawe igihe cyose winjiye hamwe nigikoresho gishya.
security_enable_pin_desc: Uzakenera kwinjiza imibare 4 ya pin mugihe wemeza ibikorwa byingenzi.
security_2fa_app_desc: Porogaramu zibiri zo kwemeza porogaramu zongeramo urwego rwumutekano kuri konte yawe. Mugihe winjiye mubikoresho bishya ugomba kwinjiza igihe cyimyandikire yimibare 6.
2fa_instruction: Nyamuneka andika kode yumutekano muri porogaramu yawe yemewe.
2fa_support_text: Niba udafite code yumutekano wawe, nyamuneka
turnstile_token_missing: Ikimenyetso cyo kugenzura umutekano kirabuze. Nyamuneka gerageza.
2fa_dialog_body_text: Ukoresheje porogaramu yemeza nka Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, Authy, cyangwa 1Password, suzuma kode ya QR. Bizabyara imibare 6 kugirango winjire hepfo.
2fa_dialog_note_text: Niba ufite ikibazo cyo gukoresha code ya QR, hitamo ibyandikishijwe intoki kuri porogaramu yawe, hanyuma wandike izina ukoresha na kode:
setup_2fa_instructions: Shiraho ibintu bibiri byemewe kugirango ubone konti yawe
please_wait: Tegereza mu gihe twemeza kode yawe...
2fa_extra_security: Ongeraho urwego rwumutekano kuri konte yawe
2fa_enabled_desc: Konti yawe irinzwe n'uburyo bwo kwemeza ibintu bibiri. Uzakenera kwinjiza kode y'imibare 4 mugihe winjiye ukoresheje ibikoresho bishya.
2fa_disabled_desc: Koresha uburyo bwo kwemeza ibintu bibiri kugira ngo wongereho urwego rw'umutekano kuri konti yawe. Uzakenera kwinjiza kode y'imibare ine ijyanye n'igihe mugihe winjira.
2fa_initial_desc: Reba ibintu bibiri byemewe byo kwemeza kugirango urebe niba konte yawe irinzwe hamwe nâ€™umutekano wongeyeho.
check_2fa_status_description: Reba uko 2FA imeze kugirango urebe niba konte yawe irinzwe
disable_2fa_warning_message: Guhagarika kwemeza ibintu bibiri bizatuma konte yawe itagira umutekano. Uzi neza ko ushaka gukomeza?
disable_2fa_security_note: Konti yawe izarindwa gusa n'ijambo ry'ibanga ryawe.
2fa_login_verification_subtitle: Andika kode y'imibare 4 ivuye muri porogaramu yawe yo kwemeza kugira ngo wuzuze kwinjira kwawe.
2fa_login_info: Fungura porogaramu yawe yemewe kugirango ubone kode.
welcome_description:
Uzuza iyi nyigisho ngufi ya bonus idasanzwe.

Bizatwara umunota umwe gusa!
free_spins_description:
Buri munsi cyangwa icyumweru winjiye, konte yawe izajya itangwa buri munsi 'Kuzunguruka Ubusa' na buri cyumweru 'Agasanduku k'Amayobera'.

Umubare wakiriye biterwa nurwego rwa konte yawe.
daily_streak_description:
Buri munsi winjiye kandi winjiza umubare wibiceri byibuze, urashobora gusaba umurongo wawe wa buri munsi.

Iminsi ikurikiranye usaba umurongo wawe, niko ibihembo byinshi!

Urwego rwohejuru rwa konte narwo rubona ibihembo byinshi.
ptc_ads_description:
Reba Amatangazo ya PTC kubwamamaza bwihuse, bugufi kugirango uzamure igiceri cyawe cya buri munsi.

Amatangazo azafungura muri tab nshya, bityo rero urebe ko iguma ifunguye kugeza igihe kirangiye!
missions_description:
Uzasangamo amajana yubutumwa nibibazo byo kurangiza mugice cya 'Inshingano' kurubuga.

Kurangiza ubutumwa nibibazo ninzira nziza yo kubona bonus Ibiceri.

Reba Earn â†’ 'Inshingano za Bonus' kugirango ubone ibisobanuro birambuye.
offers_description:
Kurangiza ibyifuzo nimwe muburyo bwiza bwo kubona ibiceri kuri GigaFaucet.

Impano zirashobora kuboneka mugice cya 'Earn' kurubuga.

Hariho ubwoko bwinshi butandukanye bwo gutanga. Witondere kubagenzura kubigukorera ibyiza.
xp_description:
Igihe cyose urangije gutanga, gukina kugwiza, cyangwa kureba videwo, nibindi, uzabona XP (amanota yuburambe).

Kubona XP bizamura konte yawe, gufungura ibintu byinshi nibihembo binini.

Urashobora kubona urwego rwa konte kurupapuro rwawe cyangwa Bonus.
withdraw_description:
Urashobora gukuramo ibiceri byawe umaze gukubita byibuze 30.000.

Gukuramo, jya kuri Konti â†’ 'Cash Out' hanyuma uhitemo uburyo ukunda bwo kubikuramo.

Kurikiza amabwiriza kugirango urangize gukuramo.
all_set_description:
Ubu uriteguye gutangira kubona ibiceri kuri GigaFaucet!

Wibuke kugenzura buri munsi kuri bonus yawe izunguruka hamwe nagasanduku kayobera, hamwe nibisabwa byuzuye hamwe nubutumwa kugirango wongere amafaranga menshi.

Amahirwe masa kandi wishimane!
tutorial_reward_desc: Saba 3 Bonus izunguruka hamwe nagasanduku 2 kayobera
referrals_manage_desc: Sangira GigaFaucet n'inshuti & umuryango wawe kugirango ubone amafaranga agera kuri 25% kuri buri kohereza.
referrals_manage_help: Niba ufite ikibazo, nyamuneka sura Urupapuro rwadufasha.
referrals_link_desc: Sangira umurongo wawe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, blog, cyangwa imbuga za PTC n'ibindi. Abakoresha bose biyandikishije binyuze kumurongo wawe bazaguha amafaranga!
referrals_details_desc: Amarushanwa yoherejwe yoherejwe buri kwezi kandi yishyurwa mu mpera za buri kwezi. Shakisha ibyanditswe kuri buri mukoresha woherejwe.
referral_get_started_desc: Ohereza gusa abakoresha kuri GigaFaucet ukoresheje umurongo wawe woherejwe. Bazahita bakurikiranwa kandi bitirirwa nawe niba biyandikishije igihe icyo aricyo cyose muminsi 30.
referral_point_1: Uzabona 25% by'amafaranga yose yo kohereza kuri roulette NGO UBEHO.
referral_point_2: Uzinjiza kandi 10% mubyoherejwe byose bitanga amafaranga yinjiza.
referral_point_4: Kohereza kubikoresho bimwe cyangwa murugo rumwe ntibyemewe kandi ntibizabarwa nkibyoherejwe.
referral_warning: AKAMARO: Kohereza bitemewe, impimbano cyangwa kwigana ntibizabarwa. Konti yawe irashobora guhagarikwa kandi ibiceri byose byatakaye mugihe wasanze wohereje ibintu bitemewe.
referral_banner_note: Kanda kugirango ukoporore kode hanyuma ukoreshe banneri kurubuga rwawe cyangwa blog kugirango ukurure.
referral_get_started_warning: AKAMARO: Kohereza bitemewe, impimbano cyangwa kwigana ntibizabarwa. Konti yawe irashobora guhagarikwa kandi ibiceri byose byatakaye mugihe wasanze wohereje ibintu bitemewe. Dufite ingamba zihamye zo kumenya no gukumira kohereza bitemewe. Waraburiwe.
coins_history_title: Ibiceri byanyuma byabonye amateka. Kera {iminsi} Iminsi
join_crypto_event_widget_text: Injira buri munsi ya Crypto Adventure
join_crypto_event_description_widget_tex:
Shaka, ukine, kandi ukusanya ibihembo buri munsi binyuze mubikorwa byihariye, ibihembo bya streak,
n'amarushanwa y'abaturage.
event_earn_coins_continue_streak: Shaka ibiceri kugira ngo ukomeze gutera intambwe yawe
event_daily_streak_resets: Imirongo ya buri munsi isubiramo mumasaha {0}
event_invite_friends_win_coins: Tumira inshuti zawe kandi utsindire ibiceri ubuzima bwawe bwose!
change_your_country_description: Hitamo igihugu utuyemo. Ibikenewe bizaterwa n'iki gihugu.
change_your_language_note: Guhindura ururimi rwawe bizavugurura interineti yose.
offer_token_description: Nibitekerezo byawe ukoresha ID, ushobora gukoresha kugirango ubaze Offerwall kugirango ukemure ibibazo byawe.
upload_new_avatar_desc: Ishusho igomba kuba muburyo bwa PNG cyangwa JPEG kandi ntigomba kurenza 1MB mubunini
reward_description_prefix: Urwego rwo hejuru nkuko winjiza & fungura ibihembo bishya. Winjiza amanota 1XP kuri buri
change_your_email_description: Uzakira kode ukoresheje imeri kugirango wemeze aderesi imeri yawe.
change_your_email_success: Imeri yawe yahinduwe neza. Kode yo kugenzura yoherejwe kuri imeri yawe nshya.
new_email_mismatch: Imeri nshya no kwemeza ntabwo bihuye
new_email_same_as_current: Imeri nshya igomba kuba itandukanye na imeri iriho
change_your_country_note: Urashobora guhindura igihugu cyawe inshuro 3 gusa kumwaka.
setup_2fa_app_description: Koresha porogaramu yo kwemeza nka [Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, Authy,] cyangwa [1Password]. Skena kode ya QR iri hepfo. Izaguha kode y'imibare 4 kugira ngo winjize hano hepfo.
setup_2fa_app_note: Niba ufite ikibazo cyo gusikana kode ya QR, hitamo ibyandikishijwe intoki muri porogaramu yawe yemewe hanyuma wandike izina ukoresha hamwe na code ikurikira:
failed_to_change_name: Byananiwe guhindura izina. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
name_unchanged: Izina rishya ni kimwe nizina ryawe ryubu
change_password_description: Ushobora guhindura ijambo ry'ibanga rya konti yawe.
password_changed_successfully: Ijambobanga ryavuguruwe neza. Nyamuneka ongera winjire hamwe nijambobanga rishya.
failed_to_change_password: Kunanirwa guhindura ijambo ryibanga. Nyamuneka gerageza.
twofa_description: Porogaramu zo kwemeza ibintu bibiri (two factor authentication) zongerera umutekano kuri konti yawe. Iyo winjiye kuri terefone nshya, ugomba kwinjizamo kode y'imibare ine ijyanye n'igihe.
security_pin_description: Uzakenera kwinjiza kode ya 4 ya PIN mugihe wemeza ibikorwa byingenzi.
security_pin_must_be_numeric: PIN igomba kuba irimo imibare gusa
failed_to_enable_security_pin: Byananiwe gufungura PIN y'umutekano. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
enable_security_pin_note: Koresha umutekano wawe 4 wimibare PIN kugirango wemeze ibikorwa bya konti ikomeye.
notifications_description: Emera kumenyesha kwakira integuza kubintu byingenzi
show_stats_description: Iyo bishobotse, imibare ya konte yawe irerekanwa kumwirondoro wawe. Gushoboza kubisanzwe.
anonymous_contests_description: Iyo bishobotse, konte yawe igaragara itazwi kurutonde rwamarushanwa. Kureka kubisanzwe.
delete_account_description: Gusiba konte yawe birahoraho. Ibihembo byawe, ibiceri no kohereza bizatakara burundu.
country_not_changed_error: Igihugu cyatoranijwe ni kimwe nigihugu cyawe cyubu
delete_confirmation_description: Wabonye kode y'imibare 6 kugira ngo wemeze konti yawe isibwe.

balances_update_info: Amafaranga asigaye avugururwa buri minota {0}. Amateka agarukira ku minsi {1} gusa.
enter_2fa_code_from_app: Andika kode yawe y'imibare 4 uvuye muri porogaramu yo kwemeza
code_must_be_exactly_6_digits: Kode igomba kuba ifite imibare 6 gusa
code_must_be_numbers_only: Kode igomba kuba irimo imibare gusa
